sub-list.name: Requirements
sub-list.code:
should end with .rest extension


Multiple requests need to be seperated by "###" in a new line

sub-list.name: POST
sub-list.code:
POST https://tuitiontripura.000webhostapp.com/api/registration.php HTTP/1.1
content-type: application/json

{
    "name": "sample",
    "time": "Wed, 21 Oct 2015 18:27:50 GMT"
}

for form data

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

name='sample'&email='email@email.com'
